description: Modify protocol properties on Solaris/illumos systems.

temporary.description: Specifies that the property value is temporary. Temporary property values do not persist across reboots.

state.description: Set or reset the property value.

property.description: Specifies the name of property we want to manage.

protocol.description: Specifies the procotol for which we want to manage properties.

value.description: Specifies the value we want to set for the property.
